item.title: Conventions
item.description: Contributing to ownCloud Web Linting and Tests Changelog Items Code Conventions Early Returns Translations TypeScript Vue 3 and Composition API Dependencies This is a collection of tips and conventions to follow when working on the ownCloud web frontend. Since it is a living document, please open a PR if you find something missing. Contributing to ownCloud Web Everyone is invited to contribute. Simply fork the codebase, check the issues for a suitable one and open a pull request!
